A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie gave some fun twists to the Star Wars saga\, while still seeming to keep to the mirrored trilogy stylings of the previous instalments.

The characters were fun\, the visuals breathtaking\, and the story made for a fun romp from beginning to end. 

Also\, Mark Hamill and old cranky Luke made every scene with him a delight.
